channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Start Here
item.description: Junior 2 Senior is an online, text based, serie where I try to unload all my knowledge for younger computer engineers that want to accellerate their carreer path. The goal is to provide all the necessary notion and way of reasoning around problems for people to be hired in high-tech companies. In this series we will not talk about the latest javascript framework. Different resources are more apt for it.
